content: *fun for halloween or mardi gras lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70463ad skill level easy level 2 size fits s m l children and adults *smallest size will also fit pets * circumference about 18 21 24 in 46 67 5 77 5 cm height after felting 7 8-3/4 10-1/2 in 18 22 26 5 cm a lion® wool article #820 *discontinued* 158-316 yards *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * plus b 320-153 fun fur yarn black 1 ball crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers worked from the tip down fur yarn trim added for brim felt hat to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
